data.display: Mail server hostname or IP address
data.name: MailServerURL

integration_instances.name: Core REST API - Standard XSIAM API Key Cred

data.name: url
data.info: For Cortex or Cortex XSIAM, use the Copy API URL button on the API Keys page. For Cortex, use the server URL.

data.name: use_tenant
data.info: Whether API calls should be made to the current tenant instead of the main tenant.

data.name: auth_method
data.info: Whether authentication should be using "Standard" API key or "Advanced" API key. For XSOAR version < 8.0.0, choose "Standard".

data.name: creds_apikey
data.info: Please provide API Key ID when using Cortex XSIAM or Cortex and above.

data.name: timeout
data.info: The timeout of the HTTP requests sent to Cortex API (in seconds).

data.name: timeout
data.info: The timeout of the HTTP requests sent to Cortex API (in seconds).

data.display: Number of maximum tabs each Chrome will be allowed to open.
data.name: max_chrome_tabs_count

data.display: Number of maximum Chrome instances to keep running simultaneously.
data.name: max_chromes_count

data.display: Maximum time to wait for a page to load (in seconds)
data.name: max_page_load_time

data.display: Time to wait before taking a screenshot (in seconds)
data.name: wait_time
feedReliability
data.info: Reliability of the source providing the intelligence data.

data.name: feedBypassExclusionList
data.info: When selected, the exclusion list is ignored for indicators from this feed. This means that if an indicator from this feed is on the exclusion list, the indicator might still be added to the system.

data.name: feedIncremental
data.info: Incremental feeds pull only new or modified indicators that have been sent from the integration. As the determination if the indicator is new or modified happens on the 3rd-party vendor's side, and only indicators that are new or modified are sent to Cortex, all indicators coming from these feeds are labeled new or modified.

data.name: integrationReliability
data.info: Reliability of the source providing the intelligence data.

data.name: proxy
data.info: Effect the `ip` command and the other commands only if the Proxy URL is not set.

data.name: proxy_url
data.info: Supports socks4/socks5/http connect proxies (e.g. socks5h://host:1080). Will effect all commands except for the `ip` command.

data.name: rate_limit_errors_suppressed
data.info: Whether Rate Limit errors should be supressed or not.

data.name: rate_limit_retry_count
data.info: The number of times to try when getting a Rate Limit response.

data.name: rate_limit_wait_seconds
data.info: The number of seconds to wait each iteration when getting a Rate Limit response.

data.name: with_error
data.info: If set, failed command results will be returned as warnings instead of errors.

jobs.name: Auto Triage
jobs.details: This playbook accesses the API for XSIAM and by default must attract starred alerts within 6 hours or they will be closed as low fidelity alerts.

jobs.name: Collect Playbook Metrics
jobs.playbookId: JOB - Store Playbook Metrics in Dataset
